name: REFCOM
goal: Refcom's main goal is to promote best practice in refrigerant handling which means working to industry codes of practice and in compliance with all current legislation to ensure containment of refrigerant of any type. Companies are accredited via a 3rd party audit.
interests: Climate Action, Customs, Energy, Environment, International co-operation and development, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives:
Registration of companies and businesses in compliance with the F gas Regulations EC517/2014 and all implications of this Regulation.

EN378 and various product standards associated with stationary refrigeration, air conditioning & heat pump equipment.
